    • handleDrawnGoldDeckCardEvent

      public void handleDrawnGoldDeckCardEvent(PlayerToken playerToken, int drawnCardId, boolean deckEmptied, Integer nextCardId, int handIndex)
      Description copied from interface: GameEventHandler
      This method handles the received update of a drawn card from the gold deck
      Specified by:
      handleDrawnGoldDeckCardEvent in interface GameEventHandler
      Parameters:
      playerToken - the token of the player who draws the card from the gold deck
      drawnCardId - the drawn card id
      deckEmptied - a flag that is true if the deck is now empty, false otherwise
      nextCardId - the id of the next card; null if there is no next card
      handIndex - the position (0,1,2) of the drawn card in the player hand

    • handleDrawnResourceDeckCardEvent

      public void handleDrawnResourceDeckCardEvent(PlayerToken playerToken, int drawnCardId, boolean deckEmptied, Integer nextCardId, int handIndex)

      Specified by:
      handleDrawnResourceDeckCardEvent in interface GameEventHandler
      Parameters:
      playerToken - the player token which drew the card
      drawnCardId - the id of the drawn card
      deckEmptied - a flag that is true if the deck is now empty, false otherwise
      nextCardId - the id of the next card; null if there is no next card
      handIndex - the position (0,1,2) of the drawn card in the player hand
